snippet: With the hotel industry recovering, operators are breathing a sigh of relief. But business travelers used to low rates, last-minute availability and perks like free Wi-Fi are less enthusiastic.
abstract: Domestic hotel industry is on cusp of widespread recovery; business travelers used to low rates, last-minute availability and perks like free Wi-Fi are less enthusiastic.
lead_paragraph: With the hotel industry recovering, operators are breathing a sigh of relief. But business travelers used to low rates, last-minute availability and perks like free Wi-Fi are less enthusiastic.

headline.seo: Travel Managers Brace for an Upturn in Lodging Rates
headline.main: Travel Managers Brace for an Upturn in Lodging Rates
